Tribesmen gang life member Riki Epiha dies in Waikato Expressway motorcycle crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tribesmen-gang-life-member-riki-epiha-dies-in-waikato-expressway-motorcycle-crash/NR2EFW4M4JCFZN5E3SVGICDVEQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/tribesmen-gang-life-member-riki-epiha-dies-in-waikato-expressway-motorcycle-crash/NR2EFW4M4JCFZN5E3SVGICDVEQ/ A witness said the man's motorbike slid out and he went headfirst into the middle barrier. Mon, 07 Oct 2024 04:00:00 +0000 Riki Taipiria Fabien Epiha, 64, died after a single-vehicle crash on the Waikato Expressway on Sunday afternoon. He was a life member of the Tribesmen MC Murupara chapter. Photo / Supplied
